text: ittae eojekkaji geuui jiwileul buleowo haessdeon ideul-i malhagil hana nim-i wonhasa geubun-ui jong-ege il-yong hal yangsig-eul deohayeo jusigeona gamso hasineun bun-eun balo hananim-isila sillo uliege hananim-ui eunhyega eobs-eossdeolamyeon geubun-eun daejilo hayeogeum ulileul samkyeobeolidolog hayeoss-eulila hananim-eul geoyeoghaneun jadeul-eun gyeolko beonseonghaji moshanola
